channel.title: DayZ Viet Nam
channel.description: Recent content on DayZ Viet Nam

item.title: START HERE!
item.description: Welcome to the DayZ Viet Nam server. Here you can find the server connect information, guide on change your character’s name in game, FAQ.

item.title: About
item.description: About DayZ Viet Nam We are a group of DayZ game lovers in Viet Nam. We host a few gameservers for free as a tribute to the community. Main gameserver features: Expansion Mods Players-vs-Environment (PVE) Traders & Safe Zones Airdrops Fun, chill gameplay FPS+, enjoy powerful server performance Free to Play Active ðŸŽ® Play Now ðŸŽ® Why English? Vietnamese will come later, site will be multilang. About our tech stack & providers Our website builds with Hugo static site generator and Mainroad theme.

item.description: Take a peek at what we have built today so far.

item.title: Frequently asked questions (FAQ)
item.description: Browse this FAQ page to find answers to frequently asked questions that have not been covered elsewhere in the documentation.
